Package com.rgb

Class Enemy

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rgb.Enemy
  • public class Enemy
extends java.lang.Object
    Enemy - element of the game that is responsible for enemy on game screen
    Author:
    Kate Kolokhina

        vel - - enemy movement speed
        lvl - - level at which this enemy is

      • checkCollision

        public boolean checkCollision​(double frameW,
                              double frameH)
        This method check the collision between enemy and hero or game world
        Parameters:
        frameW - - width of frame
        frameH - - height of frame
        Returns:
        - return boolean: TRUE if enemy turn around and should go back, FALSE if enemy continue going in its direction

      • move

        frameH - - height of frame
